pages.text: $(2)This chapter is about the $(5)Touhou Little Maid$() mod. To start working on this mod, you need the game stage $(c)nether$() (i.e ever been to the nether). The mod's content and mobs will not unlock until then.

For elaborate content and guides, view the $(5)$(o)Memorizable Gensokyo$() book in your Omnipedia.$(7)(Put your omnipedia in crafting table to keep it up to date)$(). Different from the mod's original way, in this modpack you use $(d)Loli™ lolipop$() $(7)(No spelling mistake here)$() to tame and lure little maids. Due to the fact that maid's health is fixed at 20 in the original mod, you can eat the loli lolipop near a maid to set her health to 4 times of your health. This lolipop can be crafted with time shards.

$(5)$(l)How to look up Altar crafting recipes:$()$(br2) First, randomly look up an item's recipe in JEI, and click the crafting workplace tag on the middle top (i.e If you are looking for a crafting table recipe, click on the 'Crafting' label). Then use the arrows on the topmost to switch between categories until you find a Japanese Torii that reads 'Altar Craft', click on that to see all altar crafting recipes.$(br).
$(2)Note: In this modpack, maid summoning and maid revival recipes are changed, use the above method to find the correct recipe.
